templates.title: Reload bypassing cache
templates.body: Try a hard reload to bypass cached resources. In Ask a Fox ToolKit, click **Reload (bypass cache)**, then test the site again.

templates.title: Clear site data for current site
templates.body: Clearing cookies/storage for just this site can reset a stuck state. Use **Clear site data (this origin)** in Ask a Fox ToolKit, then reload.

templates.title: Thank participants
templates.body: Thanks for helping during the Reply‑a‑thon! Your support keeps Firefox strong. If you’d like to help Thunderbird users too, open the **Thunderbird** tab in Ask a Fox ToolKit.
